Text: The Department for Transport and Civil Aviation Authority were on standby with a repatriation contingency plan called Operation Matterhorn, with a potential cost of about £600million.
Cause: The Department for Transport and Civil Aviation Authority were on standby with a repatriation contingency plan called Operation Matterhorn
Sentence: <e1>The Department for Transport and Civil Aviation Authority were on standby with a repatriation contingency plan called Operation Matterhorn</e1>, with <e2>a potential cost of about £600million.</e2>
